    "sentences": [
      "To The Dean, Research & Development   Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology  Through:   The Head of Department   The Convener , Departmental Undergraduate  Committee (DUGC)   Computer Science Department  23rd , August 2024   Subject: Application for Reimbursement of Registration Fee for 27th ICPR Conference   Respected Sir,   I am pleased to inform you that my research paper has been accepted for presentation at the 27th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR).",
      "The conference will be held from December 1st to 5th 2024, and the  student registration fee for participation is ₹ 37,600 which needs to be completed by the next week.   ",
      "As per the institute's notification Ref No: RGIPT-JAIS/R&D/2021-22/13, which allows reimbursement of registration fees for international conferences, I kindly request your approval to reimburse the amount of ₹25,000 for this purpose.   ",
      "Attached herewith are the following documents for your reference:  1.",
      "The acceptance email from the 27th ICPR conference.  ",
      "2.",
      "The registration fee webpage for the conference.  ",
      "3.",
      "A copy of the notification Ref No: RGIPT-JAIS/R&D/2021 -22/13 regarding reimbursement for international conferences.   ",
      "I am looking forward to your kind consideration and approval of my request.   ",
      "Thank you for your continuous support and encouragement.   ",
      "Yours sincerely,   Pathikreet Chowdhury  21cs2026  Computer Science Department .   "
    ],

    <sentences>
      <item>To The Dean, Research &amp; Development   Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology  Through:   The Head of Department   The Convener , Departmental Undergraduate  Committee (DUGC)   Computer Science Department  23rd , August 2024   Subject: Application for Reimbursement of Registration Fee for 27th ICPR Conference   Respected Sir,   I am pleased to inform you that my research paper has been accepted for presentation at the 27th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR).</item>
      <item>The conference will be held from December 1st to 5th 2024, and the  student registration fee for participation is ₹ 37,600 which needs to be completed by the next week.   </item>
      <item>As per the institute's notification Ref No: RGIPT-JAIS/R&amp;D/2021-22/13, which allows reimbursement of registration fees for international conferences, I kindly request your approval to reimburse the amount of ₹25,000 for this purpose.   </item>
      <item>Attached herewith are the following documents for your reference:  1.</item>
      <item>The acceptance email from the 27th ICPR conference.  </item>
      <item>2.</item>
      <item>The registration fee webpage for the conference.  </item>
      <item>3.</item>
      <item>A copy of the notification Ref No: RGIPT-JAIS/R&amp;D/2021 -22/13 regarding reimbursement for international conferences.   </item>
      <item>I am looking forward to your kind consideration and approval of my request.   </item>
      <item>Thank you for your continuous support and encouragement.   </item>
      <item>Yours sincerely,   Pathikreet Chowdhury  21cs2026  Computer Science Department .   </item>
    </sentences>

", "extracted_text": "To 
The Dean, Research & Development   
Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology  
Through:   
The Head of Department   
The Convener , Departmental Undergraduate  Committee (DUGC)   
Computer Science Department  
23rd , August 2024  
 
Subject: Application for Reimbursement of Registration Fee for 27th ICPR Conference  
 
Respected Sir,  
 
I am pleased to inform you that my research paper has been accepted for presentation at the 27th 
International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR). The conference will be held from December 1st to 5th 
2024, and the  student registration fee for participation is ₹ 37,600 which needs to be completed by the next 
week.  
 
As per the institute's notification Ref No: RGIPT-JAIS/R&D/2021-22/13, which allows reimbursement of 
registration fees for international conferences, I kindly request your approval to reimburse the amount of 
₹25,000 for this purpose.  
 
Attached herewith are the following documents for your reference:  
1. The acceptance email from the 27th ICPR conference.  
2. The registration fee webpage for the conference.  
3. A copy of the notification Ref No: RGIPT-JAIS/R&D/2021 -22/13 regarding reimbursement for international 
conferences.  
 
I am looking forward to your kind consideration and approval of my request.  
 
Thank you for your continuous support and encouragement.   
Yours sincerely,   
Pathikreet Chowdhury  
21cs2026  
Computer Science Department .  
 "}
